summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3967, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds." 32nd Avenue Northwest, from West 71st Street to West 85th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to existing mains together with such appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper fire protection of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3967 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
